command.text: select "TransorderDetail"."TransorderLnID" "TransorderLnID" ,"TransorderDetail"."TransorderID" "TransorderID" ,"Transorder"."TransorderInform" "TransorderTransorderInform" ,"TransorderCstm_"."Cstm_Nm" "TransorderCstm_Cstm_Nm" ,"TransorderCstm_Area"."Area_name" "TransorderCstm_AreaArea_name" ,"TransorderCstm_Evaluation"."Evaluation_name" "TransorderCstm_EvaluationEvaluation_name" ,"TransorderCstm_acc_"."Acc_Nm" "TransorderCstm_acc_Acc_Nm" ,"TransorderCstm_Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "TransorderCstm_Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"TransorderCstm_curncy_"."Curncy_Nm" "TransorderCstm_curncy_Curncy_Nm" ,"TransorderCstm_TSNEF"."TSNEF_name" "TransorderCstm_TSNEFTSNEF_name" ,"TransorderCstm_TSNEFNO1"."TSNEF1_name" "TransorderCstm_TSNEFNO1TSNEF1_name" ,"TransorderCstm_Slm_"."Slm_Nm" "TransorderCstm_Slm_Slm_Nm" ,"Transordertranscurrent"."transcurrentdesc" "Transordertranscurrenttranscurrentdesc" ,"TransordertransloadingDest"."transloadingDestdesc" "TransordertransloadingDesttransloadingDestdesc" ,"Transorderloadingtype"."loadingtypedesc" "Transorderloadingtypeloadingtypedesc" ,"Transordertrnsdilv"."trnsdilvdesc" "Transordertrnsdilvtrnsdilvdesc" ,"TransorderDetail"."CardriverNo" "CardriverNo" ,"Cardriver"."Emp_Nmdriver" "CardriverEmp_Nmdriver" ,"Cardriversgm"."sgm_Nm" "Cardriversgmsgm_Nm" ,"CardriversgmOpco"."OpcoName" "CardriversgmOpcoOpcoName" ,"CardriverEmp_no1"."Emp_NOt" "CardriverEmp_no1Emp_NOt" ,"CardriverEmp_no1sgm"."sgm_Nm" "CardriverEmp_no1sgmsgm_Nm" ,"CardriverEmp_no1salrycat"."grade_desc_a" "CardriverEmp_no1salrycatgrade_desc_a" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Blood_Type"."ModifiedBy" "CardriverEmp_no1Blood_TypeModifiedBy" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Bnk_"."Bnk_Acc" "CardriverEmp_no1Bnk_Bnk_Acc" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Sub_Bnk"."Bnk_Acc" "CardriverEmp_no1Sub_BnkBnk_Acc" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "CardriverEmp_no1Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Depm_"."Depm_Nm" "CardriverEmp_no1Depm_Depm_Nm" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Educt_Type"."Educt_Nm" "CardriverEmp_no1Educt_TypeEduct_Nm" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Job_Stu"."Emp_Stunm" "CardriverEmp_no1Job_StuEmp_Stunm" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Earning_"."Earning_Nm" "CardriverEmp_no1Earning_Earning_Nm" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Job_"."Job_Nm" "CardriverEmp_no1Job_Job_Nm" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Ownr_"."Ownr_ID" "CardriverEmp_no1Ownr_Ownr_ID" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Reljan"."Reljan_nm" "CardriverEmp_no1ReljanReljan_nm" ,"CardriverEmp_no1Status_Type"."Status_Nm" "CardriverEmp_no1Status_TypeStatus_Nm" ,"CardriverEmp_no1branch"."Desc1" "CardriverEmp_no1branchDesc1" ,"TransorderDetail"."Car_no" "Car_no" ,"Car_"."PLAT_No" "Car_PLAT_No" ,"Car_Car_Type"."Styl_Nm" "Car_Car_TypeStyl_Nm" ,"Car_carclass"."carclassname" "Car_carclasscarclassname" ,"Car_carstutus_"."carstutus_name" "Car_carstutus_carstutus_name" ,"Car_Car_Colr"."Color_name" "Car_Car_ColrColor_name" ,"Car_sgm"."sgm_Nm" "Car_sgmsgm_Nm" ,"Car_sgmOpco"."OpcoName" "Car_sgmOpcoOpcoName" ,"Car_Insurance_type"."Insurance_name" "Car_Insurance_typeInsurance_name" ,"Car_Car_Lik"."Like_name" "Car_Car_LikLike_name" ,"Car_Fbrct_Cntry"."Cntry_Nm" "Car_Fbrct_CntryCntry_Nm" ,"Car_Ownr_"."Ownr_ID" "Car_Ownr_Ownr_ID" ,"Car_Ownr_cmp_"."Grp_Nm" "Car_Ownr_cmp_Grp_Nm" ,"Car_Trfc_Dpm"."State_Nm" "Car_Trfc_DpmState_Nm" ,"Car_Sup_"."Sup_Nm" "Car_Sup_Sup_Nm" ,"Car_Sup_Acc_"."Acc_Nm" "Car_Sup_Acc_Acc_Nm" ,"Car_Sup_Cntry_"."Cntry_Nm" "Car_Sup_Cntry_Cntry_Nm" ,"Car_Sup_Curncy_"."Curncy_Nm" "Car_Sup_Curncy_Curncy_Nm" ,"TransorderDetail"."Carweight" "Carweight" ,"TransorderDetail"."Notes" "Notes" ,"TransorderDetail"."carstutus_no" "carstutus_no" ,"carstutus_"."carstutus_name" "carstutus_carstutus_name" ,"TransorderDetail"."offloadingdate" "offloadingdate" ,"TransorderDetail"."ModifiedBy" "ModifiedBy" ,"TransorderDetail"."ModifiedOn" "ModifiedOn" ,"TransorderDetail"."CreatedBy" "CreatedBy" ,"TransorderDetail"."CreatedOn" "CreatedOn" from "dbo"."TransorderDetail" "TransorderDetail" left join "dbo"."Transorder" "Transorder" on "TransorderDetail"."TransorderID" = "Transorder"."TransorderID" left join "dbo"."Stcustmr" "TransorderCstm_" on "Transorder"."Cstm_no" = "TransorderCstm_"."Cstm_No" left join "dbo"."AreaList" "TransorderCstm_Area" on "TransorderCstm_"."AreaNo" = "TransorderCstm_Area"."AreaNo" left join "dbo"."EvaluationList" "TransorderCstm_Evaluation" on "TransorderCstm_"."EvaluationNO" = "TransorderCstm_Evaluation"."EvaluationNO" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "TransorderCstm_acc_" on "TransorderCstm_"."acc_no" = "TransorderCstm_acc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "TransorderCstm_Cntry_" on "TransorderCstm_"."Cntry_No" = "TransorderCstm_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "TransorderCstm_curncy_" on "TransorderCstm_"."curncy_no" = "TransorderCstm_curncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."stcustmrtasnef" "TransorderCstm_TSNEF" on "TransorderCstm_"."TSNEFNO" = "TransorderCstm_TSNEF"."TSNEFNO" left join "dbo"."stcustmrtasnef1" "TransorderCstm_TSNEFNO1" on "TransorderCstm_"."TSNEFNO1" = "TransorderCstm_TSNEFNO1"."TSNEFNO1" left join "dbo"."Stslsman" "TransorderCstm_Slm_" on "TransorderCstm_"."Slm_No" = "TransorderCstm_Slm_"."Slm_No" left join "dbo"."transcurrentlocation" "Transordertranscurrent" on "Transorder"."transcurrentid" = "Transordertranscurrent"."transcurrentid" left join "dbo"."transloadingDest" "TransordertransloadingDest" on "Transorder"."transloadingDestid" = "TransordertransloadingDest"."transloadingDestid" left join "dbo"."transloadingtype" "Transorderloadingtype" on "Transorder"."loadingtypeid" = "Transorderloadingtype"."loadingtypeid" left join "dbo"."trnsdilvtype" "Transordertrnsdilv" on "Transorder"."trnsdilvno" = "Transordertrnsdilv"."trnsdilvno" left join "dbo"."Cadriver" "Cardriver" on "TransorderDetail"."CardriverNo" = "Cardriver"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Cardriversgm" on "Cardriver"."sgm" = "Cardriversgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "CardriversgmOpco" on "Cardriversgm"."OpcoID" = "CardriversgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."Pyempmfs" "CardriverEmp_no1" on "Cardriver"."Emp_no1" = "CardriverEmp_no1"."Emp_No" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "CardriverEmp_no1sgm" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."sgm" = "CardriverEmp_no1sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."grade" "CardriverEmp_no1salrycat" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."salrycat" = "CardriverEmp_no1salrycat"."grade_code" left join "dbo"."pyBlood" "CardriverEmp_no1Blood_Type" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Blood_Type" = "CardriverEmp_no1Blood_Type"."Blood_Type" left join "dbo"."PybnkAcc" "CardriverEmp_no1Bnk_" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Bnk_No" = "CardriverEmp_no1Bnk_"."Bnk_No" left join "dbo"."PybnkAcc" "CardriverEmp_no1Sub_Bnk" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Sub_Bnk" = "CardriverEmp_no1Sub_Bnk"."Bnk_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "CardriverEmp_no1Cntry_" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Cntry_No" = "CardriverEmp_no1Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Pydepm" "CardriverEmp_no1Depm_" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Depm_No" = "CardriverEmp_no1Depm_"."Depm_No" left join "dbo"."PyempEdu" "CardriverEmp_no1Educt_Type" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Educt_Type" = "CardriverEmp_no1Educt_Type"."Educt_Type" left join "dbo"."Pyempstu" "CardriverEmp_no1Job_Stu" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Job_Stu" = "CardriverEmp_no1Job_Stu"."Emp_stu" left join "dbo"."Pyerntsalyp1" "CardriverEmp_no1Earning_" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Earning_no" = "CardriverEmp_no1Earning_"."Earning_No" left join "dbo"."Pyjobs" "CardriverEmp_no1Job_" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Job_No" = "CardriverEmp_no1Job_"."Job_No" left join "dbo"."Pyownrmf" "CardriverEmp_no1Ownr_" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Ownr_No" = "CardriverEmp_no1Ownr_"."Ownr_No" left join "dbo"."PyReljan" "CardriverEmp_no1Reljan" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Reljan" = "CardriverEmp_no1Reljan"."reljan" left join "dbo"."PyStatus" "CardriverEmp_no1Status_Type" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."Status_Type" = "CardriverEmp_no1Status_Type"."Status_Type" left join "dbo"."schBranch" "CardriverEmp_no1branch" on "CardriverEmp_no1"."branch" = "CardriverEmp_no1branch"."branch" left join "dbo"."CarInfom" "Car_" on "TransorderDetail"."Car_no" = "Car_"."Car_No" left join "dbo"."CaCrstyl" "Car_Car_Type" on "Car_"."Car_Type" = "Car_Car_Type"."Styl_No" left join "dbo"."carclass" "Car_carclass" on "Car_"."carclass" = "Car_carclass"."carclass" left join "dbo"."carstutuslist" "Car_carstutus_" on "Car_"."carstutus_no" = "Car_carstutus_"."carstutus_no" left join "dbo"."Colorlist" "Car_Car_Colr" on "Car_"."Car_Colr" = "Car_Car_Colr"."ColorNo" left join "dbo"."glmulcmp" "Car_sgm" on "Car_"."sgm" = "Car_sgm"."sgmid" left join "dbo"."OpCo" "Car_sgmOpco" on "Car_sgm"."OpcoID" = "Car_sgmOpco"."OpcoIDidentity" left join "dbo"."Insurancetype" "Car_Insurance_type" on "Car_"."Insurance_type" = "Car_Insurance_type"."Insurance_type" left join "dbo"."Likelist" "Car_Car_Lik" on "Car_"."Car_Lik" = "Car_Car_Lik"."LikeNo" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Car_Fbrct_Cntry" on "Car_"."Fbrct_Cntry" = "Car_Fbrct_Cntry"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Pyownrmf" "Car_Ownr_" on "Car_"."Ownr_No" = "Car_Ownr_"."Ownr_No" left join "dbo"."Pycnstnt" "Car_Ownr_cmp_" on "Car_Ownr_"."cmp_no" = "Car_Ownr_cmp_"."Cmp_No" left join "dbo"."PyState" "Car_Trfc_Dpm" on "Car_"."Trfc_Dpm" = "Car_Trfc_Dpm"."State" left join "dbo"."Stsuplir" "Car_Sup_" on "Car_"."Sup_No" = "Car_Sup_"."Sup_No" left join "dbo"."GLmstrfl" "Car_Sup_Acc_" on "Car_Sup_"."Acc_No" = "Car_Sup_Acc_"."Acc_No" left join "dbo"."PYCntry" "Car_Sup_Cntry_" on "Car_Sup_"."Cntry_No" = "Car_Sup_Cntry_"."Cntry_No" left join "dbo"."Stcurncy" "Car_Sup_Curncy_" on "Car_Sup_"."Curncy_No" = "Car_Sup_Curncy_"."Curncy_No" left join "dbo"."carstutuslist" "carstutus_" on "TransorderDetail"."carstutus_no" = "carstutus_"."carstutus_no"
